name: Cosmic Symphony
movement: fly 60 ft., immobile on the ground
description: The Cosmic Symphony is a large celestial creature that flies gracefully and is invisible, creating an ethereal and majestic presence in combat. Its body resonates with thunderous power, showcasing a harmonious blend of beauty and danger.
memorable: It can incapacitate multiple foes with its Universal Music while rendering itself unseen and untouchable in its aerial domain.
goals: To control the battlefield using its music and overwhelming enemy forces.
relations: May be encountered alongside other celestial beings or as a guardian of places of great power.
environment: Typically found in areas infused with magical energy or where celestial beings congregate.
strengths: Possesses damage immunities and resistances, making it highly resilient, and excels in area control with its powerful songs.
weaknesses: Immobile on the ground, which limits its physical interaction with creatures or objects at ground level.
attacks: Can unleash thunder damage with Discordant Waves, inflicting significant area-of-effect damage and potentially deafening foes.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to incapacitate multiple creatures with its Universal Music, providing a major tactical advantage in battles.
senses: Has truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Proficient in perception, enabling it to effectively detect hidden or concealed creatures.
additional_information: Naturally invisible, which enhances its tactical surprise.
Legendary Resistance allows it to automatically succeed on failed saving throws.
Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can heal itself with the Major Chord legendary action.
Leaves a powerful impact with its area damage capabilities.
test_queries: powerful celestial creature that flies invisibly
large creature with thunder abilities and area control
thunder damage dealer with area effects
